description.displayText: Elena was our nanny starting when our son was 3 months old. She was amazing with him. She taught him developmentally appropriate activities, read him books, took him on daily outings to the library and park. She even took him to the aquarium. Elena is also an amazing cook and she cooked wonderful, healthy meals for our son. We loved working with Elena and our son loved spending time with her. We highly recommend Elena!
description.originalText: Elena was our nanny starting when our son was 3 months old. She was amazing with him. She taught him developmentally appropriate activities, read him books, took him on daily outings to the library and park. She even took him to the aquarium. Elena is also an amazing cook and she cooked wonderful, healthy meals for our son. We loved working with Elena and our son loved spending time with her. We highly recommend Elena!

description.displayText:
We were super lucky to find Lena when our son was just 1.5 months old. She worked with us full time for several months. She quickly established routines with him, which made our time with him on weekends, etc. much more enjoyable. She's very warm, nurturing, and focuses on developmental activities at all stages. She also makes sure he gets to spend time outside every day. We can tell our son really enjoys having her care for him.

We came to trust and depend on Lena very quickly and were looking forward to working with her for years. However, my husband and I decided to move out of state to be closer to family. We are really heartbroken to leave Lena and even offered for her to come with us, but she has a family in NYC.

description.displayText: I have known Lena for 15 years. Her son is now 14 years old and she raised him by herself. Now he is a successful student in one of the best NY High Schools. She is reliable, caring, smart and paying attention to details. I will highly recommend Lena for babysitting job.
